product_name: Kinetic Magnetic 3.0 Bike Trainer with Remote
long_description: A magnet-based trainer for serious cyclists, the Kinetic Magnetic 3.0 Bike Trainer features nine levels of adjustable resistance controlled via a remote shifter to get the most out of your training.
short_description: A magnet-based trainer for serious cyclists, the Kinetic Magnetic 3.0 Bike Trainer features nine levels of adjustable resistance controlled via a remote shifter to get the most out of your training.
